dict.acceptation: （处理、研究事务的）范围；眼界，见识；（活动或能力的）余地；广袤，地域；

sent.orig: Most procedural languages have the concept of scope.
sent.trans: 大多数程序设计语言都提供了“作用域”(Scope)的概念。

sent.orig: Timeboxes also prevent scope creep and they also force important trade-off decisions to be made.
sent.trans: 时间限制也能防止项目scope失控，还能迫使团队做出必要的取舍。

sent.orig: Especially gifted students such as you (All he teaches is SCOPE classes).
sent.trans: 特别是面对你们这群孩子（他指的是scope天赋班），我更不能这样做！

sent.orig: Develop Preliminary Project Scope Statement preliminary project scope statement that provides a high-level scope narrative.
sent.trans: 2制定项目初步范围说明书-制定项目初步范围说明书，概括地说明项目的范围。

sent.orig: The data member is declared in class scope, but definition is performed at file scope.
sent.trans: 这个数据成员在类的作用域里面声明，但是要在文件作用域里面定义。
